Name: Zoning, 893 Eagle Avenue Rezoning, Bronx (N 220335 ZRX)
Title: Application number N 220335 ZRX (893 Eagle Avenue Rezoning) submitted by Housing Options and Geriatric Association Resources, Inc. (H.O.G.A.R., Inc.), pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of the Bronx, Community District 3, Council District 17.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
